author: mindbridge
msg: Modifying the behaviour of the templateTag parameter.
It is now not added automatically to the component's spec.
If the component is interested in the tag with which it was inserted,
it must define a 'templateTag' parameter and Tapestry will automatically
bind it to the tag with which it was inserted in the parent component's template.

author: ehatcher
msg: #23635 & #23636 - javadoc submissions by Dang ol' Jamie
